page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: The village of Dagnall has grown considerably over the last twenty years.There are two farms,some terraced villas, a chapel and a school all dating from Victorian times, and some council houses and larger private houses built recently.The community life of the village is served by a village hall built about seventy years ago and the village is continuing to grow with the addition of new private housing.There are strong community links between Dagnall and the larger neighbouring village of Edlesborough.
